LanguageData.SimpleProsthetics.label: 简易假体
LanguageData.SimpleProsthetics.description: 先进的解剖学和材料测试，让你能制作简易假体。
LanguageData.OrganTransplantation.label: 器官移植
LanguageData.OrganTransplantation.description: Study of transplantation medicine and organ rejection management. Donor organs can now be transplanted into patients.
LanguageData.RegenerativeMedicine.label: 再生醫學
LanguageData.RegenerativeMedicine.description: Advanced research into tissue regeneration. Scars and old wounds can now be cured with glitterworld medicine.
LanguageData.Bionics.label: 仿生体
LanguageData.Bionics.description: 探索微型马达和电路的概念, 更优秀的假体前景向你敞开。
LanguageData.AdvancedBionics.label: 先进仿生体
LanguageData.AdvancedBionics.description: 使用超钒升级普通的仿生体，使之更为优秀。
LanguageData.SyntheticOrgans.label: 合成器官
LanguageData.SyntheticOrgans.description: 进一步研究纳米技术，让你能够在升级工作站制作难以置信的精良人造器官。
LanguageData.Neuroscience.label: 神经科学
LanguageData.Neuroscience.description: 让你能够对脑部施行手术。解锁脑部植入物。
